game.name: Uncrashed : FPV Drone Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Workshop, Partial Controller Support, Steam Leaderboards, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Amateur or experienced FPV pilot, learn or improve your skills on Uncrashed,the new ultra realistic FPV simulator. Simulate your own FPV drone with settings based on real values and you will have the same feeling as a real flight without the risk of breaking your drone !
game.shortDescriptionEn: Amateur or experienced FPV pilot, learn or improve your skills on Uncrashed,the new ultra realistic FPV simulator. Simulate your own FPV drone with settings based on real values and you will have the same feeling as a real flight without the risk of breaking your drone !

reviewHighlights.text: Really needs more ways to bind buttons to a radio controller. The sim itself is good compared to the few others on steam. No way to pause the game usi...
Brilliant physics, loads od maps and thousands of community maps, best sim that I have played out of 5 or 6. 10/10
